content.rendered:
Christmas is coming so close, so the atmosphere at the office of Newtecons becomes more lively and cozy. Across the corner of the company, the characteristic red and green colors of the holiday begin to fill. Also this morning, Newtecons Trade Union joined the employees of the Office Section to celebrate the holiday and enjoy meaningful moments together.

Newtecons wishes our partners, loyal customers and those who always support us a peaceful and happy Christmas – New Year.

Some images of the program:
